title: EXAMPLE Sales Internship
description: **Job Description:** Learn and grow by partnering with a complex sales force of sales and technical professionals and a variety of technology partners. The Red Hat Europe, the Middle East, and Africa (EMEA) Independent Software Vendor (ISV) team is looking for a Sales Intern to join us in Farnborough, U.K. or Munich, Germany. In this role, you will support the team to maximize revenue, market share, and positive engagement with partners. You'll team up with business development managers (BDMs) and inside sales account managers to enable sales growth for both new and existing partners. As a Sales Intern, you will work on a variety of key partner tasks to identify and grow both new and existing business while delivering a high level of customer experience.
